expo.name: BallerMapMVP
expo.description: An app that uses your location to find basketball courts near users

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: BallerMap requires geolocation to get real-time information on playgrounds in your area
infoPlist.photosPermission: BallerMap accesses your photos to let you set your profile picture.
infoPlist.cameraPermission: BallerMap accesses your camera to let you set your profile picture.
